title: Process Vendor Invoice for Payment
description: A plumbing vendor has submitted an invoice for a completed repair. The property manager must process it for payment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the vendor's invoice and the corresponding work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the invoice for 'Pro Plumbers' and matches it to work order #12345.

tasks.description: Verify the work was completed satisfactorily and the invoice amount is correct.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the work order is marked 'complete' and the invoice amount matches the estimate.

tasks.description: Approve the invoice for payment and submit it to accounting.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice is marked as 'approved' in the system, and a payment request is sent to the accounting department.
